plot: Frank is socially awkward man in late twenties stuck in a rut of boredom and dullness, until one day everything changes, for the weirder.
title: Frank and Franklin
plot_es: Frank is socially awkward man in late twenties stuck in a rut of boredom and dullness, until one day everything changes, for the weirder.
plot_en: Frank is socially awkward man in late twenties stuck in a rut of boredom and dullness, until one day everything changes, for the weirder.
